title: Professional Brush Cleaner, 32oz
description:
The most requested makeup brush cleaner on the market, ours is known for its rich blue color and vanilla scent. Top professionals rely on the quick-drying formula to clean, sanitize, and leave tools with a pleasant smell. Safe for use with natural and synthetic hairs, the cleaner immediately dissolves all traces of wax, liquid, and powder residue from brushes, spatulas, and palettes. It's the only makeup brush cleaner to remove 99.9% of all bacteria--and it conditions to extend brush life. Environmentally safe and non-carcinogenic.

Directions: Use long strokes to wipe excess makeup on a tissue or paper towel. Pour a small amount of brush cleaner in a bowl or other container, and dip brush or tool in cleaner. Remove immediately. Wipe clean on tissue. Repeat a second time if necessary. Allow to air-dry for two to five minutes. For faster drying (30 seconds), lay brushes flat on non-porous surface, hold brushes in place by handles, and fan hair dryer from six inches away for a maximum of 30 seconds.

title: It's So BIG Volumizing Mascara (Black) by Elizabeth Mott Net Weight 0.33 fl oz/10ml
description: After years of disappointing mascaras, that failed to deliver what they were supposed to do, I searched all over the world to create a mascara that gave me BIG volume. Working with the top cosmetics laboratories, I formulated the perfect volumizing mascara that didn't smudge and can be worn all day. I wear this mascara to the gym (shhh, it's a secret!), and it will not budge even after a long run or spinning class!The secret weapon:The hourglass brush shape, with its long and short bristle pattern, delivers just the right amount of mascara to each lash (like magic!), watch your lashes grow BIGGER with each layer.We are proud to be cruelty-free!
